intro.description: This cheat sheet shows you how to start designing reports with Jaspersoft Studio.

item.title: Open the Report Design Perspective
item.description: From the main menu, select Window > Open Perspective > Other..., then select the Report Design perspective.

item.title: The New Report Wizard
item.description: From the main menu, select File > New > Jasper Report, the new JasperReport wizard will start. You will have to do the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the project and report file name
Configure Data Adapter, report language, edit the query
Select fields you want to use

item.title: Report Designer
item.description: Report designer help you to resize, move, align elements. You can zoom in and out, setup a grid, and use different tools to layout elements inside the report.

item.title: Outline View
item.description: In the outline view you can see all the report elements, you can select them, you can reorder them with drag & drop, you can right click on them to create new elements, delete element, or do some other actions.

item.title: Properties View
item.description: In the properties view you can see and change all the element properties. You can reset properties values in Advanced properties tab using Restore Default Value button on the top right.

item.title: Palette
item.description: All the elements you can use in a report are visible in the palette. Just drag & drop elements from the palette to the designer to add them to the report.
